title: Typefaces used by Banks
content:
Hello,  
I seek informations about the typefaces used by international banks company.  
Which bank use which typefaces?

Many many thanks for your help :-)

Christophe Badani
author: Christophe Badani

comments.content:
:)  
Luzerner Nationalbank uses _Dolly_,  
Jyske Bank uses _Sauna_ (and a custom monospaced version of S.)  
Look/read:  
 [http://www.underware.nl/site2/index.php?id1=underware&id2=case-studies&i...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415024537/http:/www.underware.nl/site2/index.php?id1=underware&id2=case-studies&id3=01&idpic=05 "http://www.underware.nl/site2/index.php?id1=underware&id2=case-studies&id3=01&idpic=05")

Edit: I've overseen _international_, they might act nationalwide only …

Salut Christophe,

there’s a [list of Corporate fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415024537/http:/www.typografie.info/typowiki/index.php?title=Hausschrift-Liste_Unternehmen-zu-Schrift) at German Typografie.info. It features some banks, too.

[This older Typophile thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415024537/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27315) is about corporate initiated typeface designs. Nick mentions the Westminster Bank typeface, by David Quay(?), and Robb says that Fontbureau has customized a monospace Interstate for Citibank.

And there’s the [Website about Corporate Identity](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415024537/http:/users.ncrvnet.nl/mstol/index.html) by Hans Stol with a lot of useful information.

F

Thanks Thomas, good information. Sorry but it's not particulary for a international bank.  
Merci Florian :-) I know this good thread on typographie.info not the other, thanks!  
What else?

Deutsche Bank - Univers  
Citi Bank - Interstate  
Barclays - Barclays Sans & serif (custom from Monotype)  
Royal Bank of Scotland - FS Lola
